result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

TRANSCRIPT - Preliminary Hearing - 06/29/2022
Status conference on November 7, 2022 at 03:45 pm.

The defendant shall have no contact with AMG, PJG, & WG of any kind, whether direct or indirect, including in person, in writing, by phone, by e-mail or other electronic means, through a third party or in any other way or on or about the victims residences. One time exception to the residence with office present to obtain personal property.   Defendant is to remain alcohol free/maintaining absolute sobriety.   Defendant shall not possess or consume any alcohol, and not go into places that sell alcohol except incidentally such as a grocery store, convenience store or gas station or other such place where alcohol is not sold for consumption on the premises.  Defendant shall not be in the presence or possession of drugs or drug paraphernalia, or consume any medication or drug except as may be specifically prescribed by a licensed Wisconsin medical professional for defendant, and then shall be taken only as prescribed.
AMENDED 08/19/2022 Defendant shall have no abusive, violent or otherwise disorderly contact with AMG or PJG, all other conditions remain

Attorney Melissa Inlow appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Victims appeared by video from Zoom Room.  all through Zoom.  Defendant waives his in person appearance and has no objection to appearing remotely. Waived reading of Information The Defendant Entered a plea of not guilty.  Motion to modify bond to no abusive contact with victims AG and PG - granted, all other conditions remain
